videos.title: Valaire - (She's A) Winner (Ft. Alan Prater) (2023)
videos.description: Fixed camera extreme close-up "on object" object POV shot. This is a great example of when "on object" object POV shots and Fixed Camera shots work together. We're seeing the world from the hot dogs perspective, but doing so in third-person, with the help of a camera attached to the dog. Yummy!
videos.additional_info:
Valaire - (She's A) Winner (Ft. Alan Prater) (2023)
Fixed camera extreme close-up "on object" object POV shot. This is a great example of when "on object" object POV shots and Fixed Camera shots work together. We're seeing the world from the hot dogs perspective, but doing so in third-person, with the help of a camera attached to the dog. Yummy!
Technique - Fixed Cam , Probe
Director - Julien Vallée
DOP - Harley Francis
Colorist - Charles-Étienne Pascal

videos.title: Aminé - Charmander (2021)
videos.description: In the 2021 music video "Charmander" by Aminé, the artist retreats to a secluded cabin in the woods, symbolizing a quest for peace and introspection away from the pressures of fame. The video is characterized by a warm, earthy color palette and natural light, capturing the tranquil beauty of the forest setting. The nostalgic reference to Pokémon through the title "Charmander" adds a whimsical contrast to the mature themes of self-discovery and isolation.
videos.additional_info:
Aminé - Charmander (2021)

The nostalgic reference to Pokémon through the title "Charmander" adds a whimsical contrast to the mature themes of self-discovery and isolation.

videos.title: Rosalia - Saoko (2022)
videos.description: Probe lens from inside a vehicles gas tank. We don't consider this an OBJECT POV because we exit the gas tank, as well as Rosalia's agknowledgement of the camera with her smile. We'd consider this a fourth wall-breaking shot from a unique perspective.

videos.title: Halo 3 - Diorama (2007)
videos.description: A visually stunning and intricately designed model battlefield, showcasing a battle scene between human UNSC forces, including the series' protagonist Master Chief, and the alien Covenant forces. The diorama was filled with painstaking detail, including miniature soldiers, vehicles like Warthogs and Scorpions, and alien landscapes.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Majimbo - Aiza (2023)
videos.description: The music video for Aiza’s "Majimbo" showcases vibrant, energetic scenes that match the feel-good thumpy pop bassline and braggadocious flow of the song. Aiza, full of confidence, is seen walking down colorful city streets that transform into impromptu fashion runways, exuding an infectious joy and inner strength. K.O.G’s electric vocals elevate the video’s energy, capturing the pride and inspiration drawn from Elsa Majimbo’s rise to fame. The video blends Afropop, Afrobeat, and soulful R&B elements, celebrating Aiza’s journey and the empowerment of loving boldly.
videos.additional_info:
Majimbo - Aiza (2023)
The music video for Aiza’s "Majimbo" showcases vibrant, energetic scenes that match the feel-good thumpy pop bassline and braggadocious flow of the song. K.O.G’s electric vocals elevate the video’s energy, capturing the pride and inspiration drawn from Elsa Majimbo’s rise to fame. The video blends Afropop, Afrobeat, and soulful R&B elements, celebrating Aiza’s journey and the empowerment of loving boldly.

videos.alt_text: Elderbrook - Why Do We Shake In The Cold?
videos.title: Elderbrook - Why Do We Shake In The Cold? (2020)
videos.additional_info:
Elderbrook - Why Do We Shake In The Cold? (2020)
Delirium-induced fata morgana brings together two lone friends. Constantly trying to break through their bubbles, they seem stuck in ever repeating loops - Elderbrook's new video is a reminder of invisible everyday habbits and patterns that form our lives. Performers: Antonín Ničovský, Daniel Vitešník Director - Jára Moravec DoP - Filip Marek Executive Producer: Carla Mooney, Delwyn Mooney Producer - Mojaš Perović Edit: Katarina Gramatová Production Manager - Klára Plechsson 1AD - Kristýna Rousková 1AC - Jan “Hofajz” Hofmann 2AC - Richard Krejza Set dressing: Helena Liška, Václav Bejlek Props - Farid Beyzai, Martin Žerdík Ronin op. - Anton Endovshenko Drone op - Vojtěch Pollák Gaffer - Tomáš Volter Electrician - Roman Lety Jabůrek Costumes/MUP - Aneta Boháčová Catering - Lenka Egrtová Transport - Jan Salvet Production Company: Cardel Service Production Company: Bistro Films
Technique - Pass Through , Probe
Director - Jara Moravec
